lead_paragraph: Juan Martin del Potro sobbed into Novak Djokovic's shoulder, the two opponents locked in a long embrace at the net.

headline.print_headline: Resurgent Del Potro Tops No. 1 Djokovic in Olympic 1st Round
headline.main: Resurgent Del Potro Tops No. 1 Djokovic in Olympic 1st Round
